sms_masteryPanel.mustBeDockedHullmods: Must be docked at a market to build in hullmods.
sms_masteryPanel.mustBeDockedMasteries: Must be docked at a market to change active masteries
sms_masteryPanel.buildInOverMaxWarning: Warning: building in additional S-mods will incur a DP penalty
sms_masteryPanel.cantOpenPanel: Error initializing mastery panel -- close all interfaces and retry.

sms_descriptions.SModCreditsCost: Increases the credits cost of building in hullmods by %s.
sms_descriptions.SModCreditsCostNeg: Reduces the credits cost of building in hullmods by %s.
sms_descriptions.SModMPCost: Increases the mastery point cost of building in hullmods by %s, down to a minimum of %s.
sms_descriptions.SModMPCostNeg: Reduces the mastery point cost of building in hullmods by %s.
sms_descriptions.RestorationCost: Increases the cost of restoring damaged ships by %s.
sms_descriptions.RestorationCostNeg: Reduces the cost of restoring damaged ships by %s.
sms_descriptions.SModRemoval: Grants the ability to clear S-mods from ships.
sms_descriptions.SModRemovalPost: All S-mods must be removed. Costs nothing and refunds nothing.
sms_descriptions.SModsOverCapacitySingle: Grants the ability to bypass the standard S-mod limit, enabling installation of an additional %s S-mod
sms_descriptions.SModsOverCapacityPlural: Grants the ability to bypass the standard S-mod limit, enabling installation of an additional %s S-mods.
sms_descriptions.SModsOverCapacityPost: DP is increased by %s for each installed S-mod past the normal limit, rounded up.
sms_descriptions.ScaleOtherMasteries: Increases the effectiveness of all other mastery bonuses by %s.
sms_descriptions.ScaleOtherMasteriesNeg: Reduces the effectiveness of all other mastery bonuses by %s.
sms_descriptions.ScaleOtherMasteriesPost: Doesn't affect mastery bonuses that aren't scalable. May not affect some flat boosts as integer bonuses are rounded down.
sms_descriptions.FluxByShieldUpkeep: Increases flux dissipation by %s and flux capacity by %s of shield upkeep cost.
sms_descriptions.FluxByShieldUpkeepNeg: Reduces flux dissipation by %s and flux capacity by %s of shield upkeep cost.
sms_descriptions.FluxByShieldUpkeepPost: No effect if the ship has no shields.
sms_descriptions.RangeIfNoBonuses: Increases base ballistic and energy weapon ranges by %s if not affected by any other bonuses.
sms_descriptions.RangeIfNoBonusesNeg: Reduces base ballistic and energy weapon ranges by %s if not affected by any other bonuses.
sms_descriptions.RangeIfNoBonusesPost: Only counts base range bonuses. Conditional bonuses such as those occurring past a threshold do not negate this effect.
sms_descriptions.MaxOPForHull: Increases ordnance points by %s. Each %s of OP used past the base limit reduces hull integrity by %s.
sms_descriptions.MaxOPForHullPost: Hull reduction applied by this effect has a floor of %s and a cap of %s.
sms_descriptions.DPIfOnlyShip: If this is the only %s-class ship in your fleet, its DP cost is increased by %s.
sms_descriptions.DPIfOnlyShipNeg: If this is the only %s-class ship in your fleet, its DP cost is reduced by %s.
sms_descriptions.PeakCRMultipleShips: Increases peak combat readiness duration by %s for each additional %s-class ship in your fleet.
sms_descriptions.PeakCRMultipleShipsNeg: Decreases peak combat readiness duration by %s for each additional %s-class ship in your fleet.
sms_descriptions.PeakCRMultipleShipsPost: Effect stacks up to %s times and has a hard cap of %s increase to peak CR.

sms_misc.doesntAffectModules: This effect doesn't apply to modules.
sms_misc.effectCantBeDeactivatedWarning: Warning: effect can't be deactivated once active
